ygData.subject: Re: Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
ygData.msgSnippet: John, With all due respect, this is why some jerks ask 100+pp for Lambent stones-I paid 10pp for a Lambent, the other 2 I have gotten so far were given to me.
ygData.messageBody:
John,
With all due respect, this is why some jerks ask 100+pp for Lambent stones-I
paid 10pp for a Lambent, the other 2 I have gotten so far were given to me.
I refuse to pay more than 20, but when other bards pay 50, 60, or more for
one it makes it harder to get the message across.
My advice to you would be to be patient, you will find them for 20 pp, or I
believe there are enough kind souls who will /shout looting rights to one.

Scanna Swiftsinger
Level 30 (and sick of it)
Bertoxx Server
-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... <John_Senior@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, November 10, 1999 5:40 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)


>From: John_Senior@...
>
>I payed 60pp for a Lambent stone last night (was asking 100pp), I also got
>myself 2 sapphires and now all I need is the rune from Choon in WK. Anyone
>know hard this is to get, bearing in mind I am only level 27. My friend
>will help me kill him (level 28 Mage) so I think we could take him, can
>anyone tell me how hard Choon is to locate??
>
>Madagan, Bard of 27 songs - Veeshan
>
>
>
>
>"Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...> on 09/11/99
>19:36:40
>
>Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com
>
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
>Subject: [eqbards] Value of lambent stones (was AC Dilemma)
>
>
>
>
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>Agreed. I know a lot of rogues on E'ci have banded together and refused to
>purchase Ravenscale armor from anyone. 20PP seems like a fair price for
>the
>lambent stones so thats as far as I will go.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
>> It's unfortunate that the higher level bards are dumping money on these
>> such that us lower level bards. Wish we could somehow spread the word to
>> not pay that much for these things.
>>
>
>Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to toren@...
>with the subject lol.
